Sequence Information.Peptide Name: chain a, Structure Of An Indolicidin Peptide Derivative With
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=8 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=16 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=64 µg/ml), S. typhimurium defensin sensitive (MIC=2 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (MIC=16 µg/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC=4 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC>64 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Structure of the bovine antimicrobial peptide indolicidin bound to dodecylphosphocholine and sodium dodecyl sulfate micelles.
Literature.Author: Rozek A, Friedrich CL, Hancock RE.
